mapper.sql: documents_action_id AS "documentsActionId", documents_status_id AS "documentsStatusId", action AS "action", sort AS "sort", create_user AS "createUser", update_user AS "updateUser", create_time AS "createTime", update_time AS "updateTime", display AS "display"
mapper.select:
select
from daoxin_documents_action where 1 = 1
and documents_action_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.documentsActionId},'%')
and documents_status_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.documentsStatusId},'%')
and action like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.action},'%')
and sort like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.sort},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
